text: Nicholas David Pryor (born Probst; January 28, 1935 â€“ October 7, 2024) was an American actor. His career began in 1951. He was known for his roles as Victor Collins in General Hospital and Port Charles, as A. Milton Arnold in Beverly Hills, 90210, as Jim Hammen in Airplane! and as Mr. Goodson in Risky Business. Pryor was born in Baltimore, Maryland. He studied at the Gilman School and at Yale University. In 1993, he married Christine Belford. Pryor died on October 7, 2024 of cancer at his home in Wilmington, North Carolina at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Biography from ABC Network's Port Charles Category:1935 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Baltimore Category:Cancer deaths in North Carolina
title: Nicholas Pryor
